document.title: SP472-Food Works - Breakfast

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract:
The word “breakfast” means to “break the fast.” When a person fasts, he or she goes without food. At breakfast time, you have probably gone without food for 10-14 hours (fasting) because you have been sleeping.

To function properly, your body needs food like a car needs gasoline. Gasoline gives a car the energy to run. Likewise, food gives you the energy to play and learn.
